attributes.additional_details:
We urge the Transport Secretary to halt her plan to increase rail fares by 6.2% in January, bringing the total increases introduced by the Coalition to approximately 18%.

The latest increase is twice the annual increase in the cost of living and three times the average increase in wages.

At a time of squeezed family budgets, this is placing an unfair burden on rail passengers, particularly those who have to commute to get to work.
